root: ^Don't you think its time to stop this nonsense.

WhatIMean: ^You know this won't end alright, there's no happy ending at the end of the tower, the only thing waiting for you there is your own demise.
^Well you know, I have this, feeling that I need to do this no matter the cost.
^That's just the final wish of a dying man, why make it all so hard? Give up your nonsense.
^Are you sure? Have you appreciated the state your body is in? Even a man with amnesia would be able to perceive the clear signs of the pitiful state your body is in! Covered in mechanichal parts.
^And why should I listen to you?!
^I think you should know by now, who did you think you were talking to, in this empty tower. Im the only "thing" here, that worries about you, if you die, I do too.
^Then if you're me? Then you should be able to feel the same need to reach the end of this tower.
^Fine, if that's what you want, but bear in mind, in your last moments, before you wither, your choice, the end you have chosen, even when granted a way out.
